rules_text: When Waldemar enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand and you choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card until Waldemar leaves the battlefield. As long as it remains exiled, you may cast it and spend mana as though it were any type to cast it. When you do, exile Waldemar, then return him to the battlefield transformed under an opponent’s control.
special_text2:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and Waldemar’s owner gains 1 life.
[-1]: Discard a card.
[-2]: Sacrifice a non-Waldemar permanent.
